title: My Pixel2 XL has suddently Started to take minutes to open any 3rd party app
content:
A couple of days ago my Pixel2 XL (running Android 11) started to take up to several minutes to open 3rd party apps that previously would open in only a few seconds. E.g. wunderground.

I have tried clearing the cache of the apps, re-installing the apps including doing several factory resets but to no avail. 

Does anyone have any ideas what might cause this? I currently have a freshly reset device and the only 3rd party app is Wunderground and that on its own still takes 2 minutes plus to open.

Is my phone going the way of the dodo, or some weird setting that persists through resets that I may have missed?

Thanks
